section.title: Overview
section.para: JBoss Developer Studio 6.0.1 is a minor release of the Eclipse-based IDE developed and supported by Red Hat. JBoss Developer Studio provides tooling that allows for rapid Web 2.0 application development on the JBoss Enterprise Application Platform.
JBoss Developer Studio 6.0.1 corrects bugs and adds enhancements to the 6.0.0 release.
